name: Perpetual Soup
text:
Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects:
? Gain 500 LP.
? Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
If this card is in your GY: You can shuffle it back into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Perpetual Soup" once per turn.

Art & Concept by pek
